title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 3.1 - Notice of minimum balance requirements to be given depositors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 3.1 - Notice of minimum balance requirements to be given depositors

State Regulations

The Banking Board has adopted section
67.2, Part 67, general regulations
of the Banking Board to insure that every depositor having a day-of-deposit to
day-of-withdrawal account with a minimum balance requirement be given due
notice of such requirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
